section.title: DRUG FACTS
ACTIVE INGREDIENT (IN EACH 5 ML)

text.paragraph: Ibuprofen 100 mg (NSAID)*
*nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug

section.title: PURPOSE

text.paragraph: Fever reducer/Pain reliever

section.title: USES

text.paragraph: temporarily:

list.item: reduces fever
relieves minor aches and pains due to the common cold, flu, sore throat, headaches and toothaches

section.title: WARNINGS
Allergy alert:

text.paragraph: Ibuprofen may cause a severe allergic reaction, especially in people allergic to aspirin. Symptoms may include:

list.item: hives
facial swelling
asthma (wheezing)
shock
skin reddening
rash
blisters

text.paragraph: If an allergic reaction occurs, stop use and seek medical help right away.

section.title: Stomach bleeding warning:

text.paragraph: This product contains an NSAID, which may cause severe stomach bleeding. The chance is higher if the child

list.item: has had stomach ulcers or bleeding problems
takes a blood thinning (anticoagulant) or steroid drug
takes other drugs containing prescription or nonprescription NSAIDs [aspirin, ibuprofen, naproxen, or others]
takes more or for a longer time than directed

section.title: Heart attack and stroke warning

text.paragraph: NSAIDs, except aspirin, increase the risk of heart attack, heart failure, and stroke. These can be fatal. The risk is higher if you use more than directed or for longer than directed.

section.title: Sore throat warning:

text.paragraph: Severe or persistent sore throat or sore throat accompanied by high fever, headache, nausea, and vomiting may be serious. Consult doctor promptly. Do not use more than 2 days or administer to children under 3 years of age unless directed by doctor.

section.title: Do not use

list.item: if the child has ever had an allergic reaction to any other pain reliever/fever reducer
right before or after heart surgery

section.title: Ask a doctor before use if

list.item: stomach bleeding warning applies to the child
child has problems or serious side effects from taking pain relievers or fever reducers
child has a history of stomach problems, such as heartburn
child has high blood pressure, heart disease, liver cirrhosis, kidney disease, or asthma, or had a stroke
child has not been drinking fluids
child has lost a lot of fluid due to vomiting or diarrhea
child is taking a diuretic

section.title: Ask a doctor or pharmacist before use if the child is

list.item: under a doctor's care for any serious condition
taking any other drug

section.title: When using this product

list.item: take with food or milk if stomach upset occurs

section.title: Stop use and ask a doctor if

list.item:
child experiences any of the following signs of stomach bleeding:
feels faint
vomits blood
has bloody or black stools
has stomach pain that does not get better

child has symptoms of heart problems or stroke:
chest pain
trouble breathing
weakness in one part or side of body
slurred speech
leg swelling
the child does not get any relief within first day (24 hours) of treatment
fever or pain gets worse or lasts more than 3 days
redness or swelling is present in the painful area
any new symptoms appear

code.displayName: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION

section.title: Keep out of reach of children.

text.paragraph: In case of overdose, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.

section.title: DIRECTIONS

item.content: this product does not contain directions or complete warnings for adult use
do not give more than directe

list.item: find right dose on chart below. If possible, use weight to dose; otherwise use age.
repeat dose every 6-8 hours, if needed
do not use more than 4 times a day

measure only with the dosing cup provided. Dosing cup to be used with Children's Advil Suspension only. Do not use with other products. Dose lines account for product remaining in cup due to thickness of suspension.

section.title: OTHER INFORMATION

title.content: Children's Advil Suspension Fruit Flavor; Children's Advil Suspension Grape Flavor; Children's Advil Suspension White Grape Flavor; Children's Advil Bubblegum

list.item: each 5 mL contains: sodium 3 mg
one dose lasts 6-8 hours
store at 20-25C (68-77F)
see bottom of box for lot number and expiration date

title.content: Children's Advil Suspension Blue Raspberry Flavor; Children's Advil Suspension Sugar-Free Dye-Free Berry Flavor

list.item: each 5 mL contains: sodium 10 mg
one dose lasts 6-8 hours
store at 20-25C (68-77F)
see bottom of box for lot number and expiration date

section.title: INACTIVE INGREDIENTS

text.paragraph: artificial flavor, carboxymethylcellulose sodium, citric acid monohydrate, edetate disodium, FD&C red no. 40, glycerin, microcrystalline cellulose, polysorbate 80, purified water, sodium benzoate, sorbitol solution, sucrose, xanthan gum

acetic acid, artificial flavor, butylated hydroxytoluene, carboxymethylcellulose sodium, citric acid monohydrate, edetate disodium, FD&C blue no.1, FD&C red no. 40, glycerin, microcrystalline cellulose, polysorbate 80, propylene glycol, purified water, sodium benzoate, sorbitol solution, sucrose, xanthan gum

title.content: Children's Advil Suspension Blue Raspberry Flavor

text.paragraph: artificial and natural flavors, carboxymethylcellulose sodium, citric acid monohydrate, edetate disodium, FD&C blue no. 1, glycerin, microcrystalline cellulose, polysorbate 80, propylene glycol, purified water, sodium benzoate, sodium citrate, sorbitol solution, sucrose, xanthan gum

section.title: Children's Advil Suspension White Grape Flavor

text.paragraph: acetic acid, artificial flavor, butylated hydroxytoluene, carboxymethylcellulose sodium, citric acid monohydrate, edetate disodium, glycerin, microcrystalline cellulose, polysorbate 80, propylene glycol, purified water, sodium benzoate, sorbitol solution, sucrose, xanthan gum

section.title: Children's Advil Suspension Bubblegum Flavor

text.paragraph: carboxymethylcellulose sodium, citric acid monohydrate, edetate disodium, FD&C red no. 40, glycerin, microcrystalline cellulose, natural and artificial flavor, polysorbate 80, propylene glycol, purified water, sodium benzoate, sorbitol solution, sucrose, xanthan gum

section.title: Children's Advil Suspension Sugar-Free Dye-Free Berry

text.paragraph: artificial flavor, carboxymethylcellulose sodium, citric acid monohydrate, edetate disodium, glycerin, microcrystalline cellulose, polysorbate 80, propylene glycol, purified water, sodium benzoate, sodium citrate, sorbitol solution, sucralose, xanthan gum

section.title: QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS?

text.paragraph: call toll-free 1-800-88-ADVIL or ask your pharmacist, doctor or health care professional
